roleset.name: dull, continued, low, monotonous sound
roleset.note: DRONE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'drone' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 3 37.38. (from drone.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: Bee
example.text: The bee hives' constant droning reminded everyone of how busy bees really are.

example.name: manner speaking
example.text: The professor droned on and on, lulling his students to sleep.
